about_the_game:
Welcome to Luck's Labyrinth, a thrilling roguelike adventure where every step is a roll of the dice. In this monochromatic world, tinted with hints of red, you’ll dive into a perilous maze where fortune and fate intertwine. Inspired by the high stakes of casino gambling, your wits and luck will be your only allies as you navigate through rooms that change with every playthrough.

In Luck's Labyrinth, the labyrinthine halls are populated with formidable enemies, each representing the perils of chance. Face off against animated card decks, menacing slot machines, and other gambling-inspired foes that lurk in the shadows. Your journey is fraught with danger, and only the bravest will confront the five powerful bosses guarding the deepest secrets of the labyrinth.

The game's unique twist lies in its dynamic stat system. Your character's abilities and attributes are determined by the roll of the dice, ensuring that no two runs are ever the same. Adapt to your ever-changing strengths and weaknesses, and strategize to make the best out of every roll. Will you be a powerhouse with high strength or a nimble rogue with unmatched agility? The outcome is as unpredictable as a spin of the roulette wheel. As you progress, you can upgrade the highest number you can roll, giving you an edge in the labyrinth's ever-changing challenges.

As you traverse through procedurally generated rooms, you'll encounter various challenges and treasures. Each room is a gamble, offering the possibility of rare items or deadly traps. Keep an eye out for item chests, which contain special items like orbitals, powerful swords, and unique abilities to aid you in your quest. These treasures can turn the tide in your favor, providing new strategies and enhancing your chances of survival.

The game's stark black and white aesthetic, punctuated by striking red highlights, creates an atmosphere of suspense and drama, reminiscent of a high-stakes casino floor. The tension mounts with each step, every decision a bet against fate.

Prepare to be captivated by Luck's Labyrinth, where every decision, every fight, and every step is a gamble against fate. Will you emerge victorious, or will the labyrinth claim another soul? Step into the labyrinth and let the games begin!

name: Luck's Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 mb, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: In Luck's Labyrinth you're a ghostly gambler in a monochromatic afterlife. Every step is a dice roll, shaping your fate. With luck as your only weapon, uncover secrets or succumb to fate's twists. Survive spectral challenges to grow stronger, but beware luck's fickleness
